OOC: Airly, your grammar is atrocious - but you probably know that 
already.

Wheeljack-X::

"I'm not sure we're just talking about only one new faction, but they 
do say that the enemy of your enemy is your friend," Wheeljack points 
out.  He transforms to his vehicle mode, a souped-up hovercar with a 
retractable Gatling laser turret mounted on the hood.  "I'm ready to 
go."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> Owlhawk saw the Maximals gathering below and opened his comm.
> 
> Owlhawk:  Follow me I'll lead you to them.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > Blackfang watched silently Owlhawk, he studied the bot quietly.
> > 
> > Blackfang: The predacons are currently engaged in heavy combat, 
> sir. 
> > (He turned to Rodimus) From what I gather, Talos is not the 
leader 
> > anymore. I will follow you, Rodimus Prime, but I must advise 
> caution 
> > here. There is amother group on this planet and we know nothing 
of 
> > them. Just as they are hostile to the Predacons, they may be 
> hostile 
> > to us too. I will abide by your decision, though.
